post.body: I'm working all week too. But it's a gr8 privilege 2 wk on something u luv that helps people achieve their own goals, yes?
Hi Mike. How do we build our @replies? I remember the Twitter webinar a couple of months ago that mentioned it. Cant find my notes.
- Will the Masters Seminar be available for later viewing? I want to attend but I'm not available that week. Thx, Michel!
Yanik, will the Masters Seminar be available for later viewing? I want to attend but I'm not available that week. Thx, Yanik!
- Joel, will the Masters Seminar be available for later viewing? I want to attend but I'm not available that week. Thx, Joel!
- Will the Masters Seminar be availble for later viewing? I can't attend that week, but I want in on it...! Thanks, Mari!
Deals comin' like a flood! Especially the same stores giving great deals n my Inbox "with" free shipping!
Hey, I was tempted, but then I saw a grip of the SAME stores offering up 2 70% off online WITH free shipping! What about u?
Good night tweeple! It's time to dream of a white Christmas...
I'm more sleepier than I thought to write "So Twitter many variations" rather than "So many Twitter variations", or was I just 2 distracted?
Just listened to 2 of my favs - Willie Crawford being interviewed by Nick Hetcher. Their professionalism is cool & impressive...
Everybody, be safe on Christmas Day and beyond. The weather is very interesting from coast to coast. Merry Christmas!
